price: Obiara nni hͻ a ɔbɛtumi afrii Nyankopͻn akyi asi ho kwan.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
